body.bibl: Ben Jeroham, Salmon. “From the Book of the Wars of the Lord of Salmon Ben Jeroham: Refutation of Sa‘Adiah’s Arguments for the Validity of the Rabbanite Oral Tradiiton.” Edited by Nemoy, Leon. Karaite Anthology: Excerpts from the Early Literature Yale Judaica Series 7, 1952, 71–82.
